channel.title: Thistle Glen: The Shauna Burns Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to Thistle Glen! Hosted by the piano gal Shauna Burns, this is the place to find music, news, interviews, reviews, chitchat and other delicious items about her music and other magical musings including the new holiday album A Winter Gathering. Her other albums are The Moon and the Fire Circle, Anamnesis, Every Thought and Desert Tune. Find even more at www.shaunaburns.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Shauna Burns music, news, chitchat and thoughts.
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Thistle Glen! channel.itunes:author: Shauna Burns

image.title: Thistle Glen: The Shauna Burns Podcast

item.title: Gathering Memories
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #49 - Gathering the past, Gathering the memories, let's look back! New app came out this year, Dragonfly is flying in The Real World, A Winter Gathering is here! New site, 12 Days of A Winter Gathering, Green Girl Music & Arts Fest, beautiful reviews - thank you!! Sweepstakes, new videos up now, interviews and a million thank you's for all the support and kindness with the music! See you next year! xoxo
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**
item.itunes:subtitle: New Year's Eve ~ Memories of 2011

item.title: Ho Ho Ho!
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #48 - Ho Ho Ho! 'Tis the season for A Winter Gathering! I'm so thankful for all the love the new album has received, a million thank you's for all the kindness! CD Baby lovein'! The holiday shop is open at Shauna Burns.com! New video and Sweepstakes on Facebook ~ Woot!
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Witches Night
item.description:
Welcome to The Haunted Thistle Glen episode #47 - The Witches have returned to the wood... do you dare come close to the tree line?... Do you have the spine to hear our tale?... Only brave souls journey into our den...
As always find me haunting at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: 'Tis The Season
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #45 - 'Tis that time! I'm so thrilled to announce the brand new CD A Winter Gathering ~ which will be released on Oct 25th! Please see Shauna Burns.com for the Twelve Days of A Winter Gathering as we count down to release day. A big thank you to JiveWired for the beautiful new review! It's almost here!
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: New App
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #44 - Announcing the brand new FREE Shauna Burns iPhone App! It's your quick connection to the music ~ listening, lyrics, credits and more ~ the Thistle Glen Podcast, Twitter, the blog, the shop, videos, photos and so much more!

As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Music Memory
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #43 - It's the end of the year once again, let's look back at the memories! New Moon Parody from The Hillywood Show ~ Check it out! ~ Coffee After Dark Shows, Friday Nights @ Thistle Glen, Anamnesis featured on CD Baby Folk Newsletter and on Pandora, iPhone memories, Color Theory review, music features (thank you!), Green Girl Music & Arts Fest, annual haunting, holiday shop still open and Yule Ball Night. See you next year! ;)
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Witches Fright
item.description:
Welcome to The Haunted Thistle Glen episode #41 - A spine-chilling tale comes once more. Only the brave come close to hear... don't wander to far off into the darkness. We wait for you. A warning must be made, only the eerie wood will hold our secrets... come closer if you dare...
As always find me haunting at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

You can view the videos at http://www.youtube.com/shaunaburns New Color Theory album review on the blogs, Moon and Fire & Anamnesis CD Pack (save 10%) now available, Hope Ignited feature, thank you! and new show Oct 18th in Las Vegas for the Green Girl Music and Arts Fest.
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #36 - It's Friday Night @ Thistle Glen! Introducing new videos of live shows, yea! Check out The Hillywood Show New Moon Parody (it's rocks), Thanks Paul for naming "WInd" and Anamnesis in your Best Music of 2009, Coffee After Dark was great, listen to the show on the Star Chart Radio right now (on www.shaunaburns.com) and new show at Coffee After Dark on Feb 26th.

As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

item.title: Nostalgia
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #35 - It's the end of the year, time for our "looking back" episode! Big snugs to Brian Hazard/Color Theory, the release of Anamnesis (yea!), lot's of new pics, press, videos and reviews. Wandering Planets Tour, King of the Hill, new newsletter, spooks and the Holiday Shop is still up. Best of 2009 = "Driving Far" one of the Top Songs from Sonic Jive and Anamnesis named one of Collected Sounds' Best of 2009, Thank you so much! Live footage up of the Unicity Festival with Caroline Kemper on YouTube (just go to my favorites on www.youtube.com/shaunaburns) and more treats coming in the new year 2010!
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Witches Sanctum
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #33 - Come closer if you have the might... This night brings to you a tale of spooks and blood-tingling fright. We are still haunting the dead of night... Do you have the strength to come with us? Follow only if you have the nerve...
As always find me haunting at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: The Pheonix Is Rising For You
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #32 - Back from Texas and New Mexico, pics up everywhere, Wandering Planets Tour next stop in Vegas on Oct 21st & Phoenix in Nov. Spooks out in full force on all the sites. Wha ha ha!! But first an ultra special treat... Presenting: Phoenix Rising.
As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Smell a new tune
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #26 - Anamnesis will be released on April 14th on shaunaburns.com with goodles! It will be on iTunes/Amazon and others shortly after. It's the sister planet of Moon and Fire ~ and is also a memory. "Smell" and "So Tell Me..." are now up everywhere. Weekly treat, new photos, music clips and more on the way. New video album collage and announcing the Wandering Planets Tour.

As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.title: Thistle Glen Presents Color Theory
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #25 - Firstly, the Best of 2008 recap, check out the Press Section on the site for newness. New Anamnesis interview posted too!

Thistle Glen Presents Color Theory : Brian Hazard joins me for a discussion about music, his latest release The Thought Chapter, Depeche Mode and other musings.

Now go grab his music: http://www.colortheory.com/

http://www.myspace.com/colortheory

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Color-Theory/37916448940

http://www.reverbnation.com/colortheory

http://www.thesixtyone.com/colortheory/

As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**
item.itunes:subtitle: Brian Hazard/Color Theory & I talk shop.

item.title: Remember When...
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #24 - It's the end of the year, remember when this stuff happened... The holiday shop is still up, Facebook is humming, The Moon and the Fire Circle launch, tour and Around You kicked booty, Paul's best of 2008 list (Thank you!), iTunes 6 song coolness, new "Bloom" live video now up and announcing Anamnesis ~ the new EP that will be released in the new year! Lot's to come in 2009, see you then! As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**
item.itunes:subtitle: End of year show and a special musical annoucement!

item.title: Witches Lair
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #22 - Our tale continues but a warning must be made.... do not wander too far off the path. This chronicle comes from the dead of night under the ghostly full moon and might very well be the last thing you hear.... come closer if you dare... As always find me haunting at: www.shaunaburns.com

**Click Here to Listen on App**

item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #6 - It's Thistle Glen free-form! Meaning mostly random (and not so random) thoughts this time. Music Plus TV.com now has an interview and 4 live songs performed live in studio for you: http://musicplustv.com/42151/ Chicago getting closer, more cities to come on the Summer to Fall Tour. Boy is it rainy ~ good thing I like rain. As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

item.title: Harp Talk
item.description:
Welcome to Thistle Glen episode #4 - This time we have a special treat! Award winning harpist Caroline Kemper joins Thistle Glen to talk about her harp and music. Announcing the Desert Tune Summer to Fall Tour - see you on the road all summer and into the fall! And a few news items too. As always find me at: www.shaunaburns.com

item.description:
